msgSnippet: TPTP supports only a very limited set of user events as part of its automated GUI tester preview at the moment making it virtually useless for SWT/RCP for now.

Subject: Re: [junit] Junit used for Eclipse UI based Interface

TPTP supports only a very limited set of user events as part of its
automated GUI tester preview at the moment making it virtually useless
for SWT/RCP for now.

Vote for this enhancement if you want it to be more useful:

  https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=114159
